## Documentation Issue

### Type
- [ ] Typo or grammar error
- [ ] Missing documentation
- [ ] Outdated information
- [ ] Unclear explanation
- [ ] Missing example

### Location
Which file(s) need updating?
- [ ] README.md
- [ ] DEMO.md
- [ ] CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Code comments
- [ ] Other: ___

Quote the current documentation (if applicable):
> Current text here...

### Suggested Change
What should it say instead?

Any other context about the documentation issue.
